type_aliases.name: SourceLocation
type_aliases.logic: Defines a type alias 'SourceLocation' within the 'cppgc' namespace as a synonym for 'v8::SourceLocation'.  This allows cppgc to use the v8's SourceLocation type directly without needing to specify the v8 namespace every time. It essentially re-exports the v8::SourceLocation type for convenience and clarity within the cppgc namespace.

logic: This header file provides a convenient type alias within the `cppgc` namespace for `v8::SourceLocation`. This promotes code readability and simplifies the usage of V8's source location information within the C++ garbage collection (cppgc) context.
